attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
..for parliament.
It is archaic that parliament self regulates.
Defences typical such as " we abided by the rules"
But the rules are wrong.
We have shady practises happening.
People view the recent events in the lords and other MP's as nigh on criminal.
We believe the time is over for self regulation.
An independant body should be set up with the power to sack MP's, strip them of seats, investigate lords, when complaints of conduct in public office come in.
Faith in politicians is at an all time low, and people believe they get away with crime.
Bring transparency back and have an independant commission to decide on the matters.
It is the only self regulating system in the country, is archaic, and needs to change to restore public faith.
Those in authority should abide by the standards the rest of us have to comply with.
This is the way to do it

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
